__e: Ooh, he shut you down. What are you gonna do, cry?
Hey, I'll tell you what. I'll grab some popcorn. Why don't you guys meet me up in my box?
We ran out of popcorn. Oh, and I made my son and his date watch porn.
It was fun when he burped the first 10 times, but now the whole house smells like white cheddar popcorn.
And after that, I'm gonna take a bath in chardonnay and cheese popcorn while Marty says "I told ya so."
You just had all that popcorn at the movie.
